alert.note: Alert for Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 20 at 3:00PM MST until February 22 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...the central and southern San Luis Valley including Alamosa. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Wednesday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile and light weight vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Hazardous travel is anticipated with snow and blowing snow which will likely cause poor visibility on area highways.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Alamosa Vicinity, Central San Luis Valley Below 8500 Ft; Southern San Luis Valley
